H0.text: What type of animal is a bonobo. Monkey

H1.text: What type of animal is a bonobo. Lemur

H2.text: What type of animal is a bonobo. Gorilla

H3.text: What type of animal is a bonobo. Ape

A4.text: The bonobo is an endangered great ape and one of the two species making up the genus Pan

A5.text: The bonobo is the closest extant relative to humans
